00191 template <typename ValueType>
00192 bool TRanges<ValueType>::IsEmpty() const
00193 {
00194        return        m_switchPoints.empty() && (m_beginState == false);

00212 template <typename ValueType>
00213 void TRanges<ValueType>::InsertSwitchPoint(ValueType point)
00214 {
00215        std::pair<SwitchPoints::iterator, bool> insertionStatus = m_switchPoints.insert(point);
00216        if (!insertionStatus.second){
00217               m_switchPoints.erase(insertionStatus.first);
00218        }
00219 }

00236 template <typename ValueType>
00237 bool TRanges<ValueType>::IsInside(ValueType point) const
00238 {
00239        bool state = m_beginState;
00240        for (         SwitchPoints::const_iterator iter = m_switchPoints.begin();
00241                             iter != m_switchPoints.end();
00242                             ++iter){
00243               if (*iter > point){
00244                      break;
00245               }
00246 
00247               state = !state;
00248        }
00249 
00250        return state;
00251 }
00252

00254 template <typename ValueType>
00255 bool TRanges<ValueType>::IsInside(const TRange<ValueType>& range) const
00256 {
00257        bool state = m_beginState;
00258        for (         SwitchPoints::const_iterator iter = m_switchPoints.begin();
00259                             iter != m_switchPoints.end();
00260                             ++iter){
00261               if (*iter > range.GetMinValue()){
00262                      if (state){
00263                             ++iter;
00264 
00265                             // is the next switch out of checked range?
00266                             return (iter == m_switchPoints.end()) || (*iter >= range.GetMaxValue());
00267                      }
00268                      else{
00269                             return false;
00270                      }
00271               }
00272 
00273               state = !state;
00274        }
00275 
00276        return state;
00277 }

00280 template <typename ValueType>
00281 bool TRanges<ValueType>::IsInside(const TRanges<ValueType>& rangesList) const
00282 {
00283        SwitchPoints::const_iterator iter = m_switchPoints.begin();
00284        SwitchPoints::const_iterator listIter = rangesList.m_switchPoints.begin();
00285 
00286        bool state = m_beginState;
00287        bool listState = rangesList.m_beginState;
00288 
00289        for (;;){
00290               bool isListCovered = state || !listState;
00291               if (!isListCovered){
00292                      return false;
00293               }
00294 
00295               if (iter != m_switchPoints.end()){
00296                      ValueType point = *iter;
00297 
00298                      if (listIter != rangesList.m_switchPoints.end()){
00299                             ValueType listPoint = *listIter;
00300 
00301                             if (point <= listPoint){
00302                                    ++iter;
00303                                    state = !state;
00304                             }
00305 
00306                             if (listPoint <= point){
00307                                    ++listIter;
00308                                    listState = !listState;
00309                             }
00310                      }
00311                      else{
00312                             return true;
00313                      }
00314               }
00315               else{
00316                      // if no more segments in this list, check if no more switch is inside
00317                      return listIter == rangesList.m_switchPoints.end();
00318               }
00319        }
00320 }

00334 template <typename ValueType>
00335 void TRanges<ValueType>::GetUnion(const TRanges<ValueType>& rangesList, TRanges<ValueType>& result) const
00336 {
00337        SwitchPoints::const_iterator iter = m_switchPoints.begin();
00338        SwitchPoints::const_iterator listIter = rangesList.m_switchPoints.begin();
00339 
00340        bool state = m_beginState;
00341        bool listState = rangesList.m_beginState;
00342 
00343        bool resultState = state || listState;
00344 
00345        result.m_beginState = resultState;
00346        result.m_switchPoints.clear();
00347 
00348        for (;;){
00349               if (iter != m_switchPoints.end()){
00350                      ValueType point = *iter;
00351 
00352                      if (listIter != rangesList.m_switchPoints.end()){
00353                             ValueType listPoint = *listIter;
00354 
00355                             if (point <= listPoint){
00356                                    ++iter;
00357                                    state = !state;
00358                             }
00359 
00360                             if (listPoint <= point){
00361                                    ++listIter;
00362                                    listState = !listState;
00363                             }
00364 
00365                             bool unitedStateAfter = state || listState;
00366                             if (unitedStateAfter != resultState){
00367                                    result.m_switchPoints.insert(qMin(point, listPoint));
00368 
00369                                    resultState = unitedStateAfter;
00370                             }
00371                      }
00372                      else{
00373                             if (!listState){
00374                                    result.m_switchPoints.insert(iter, m_switchPoints.end());
00375                             }
00376 
00377                             return;
00378                      }
00379               }
00380               else{
00381                      if (!state && (listIter != rangesList.m_switchPoints.end())){
00382                             result.m_switchPoints.insert(listIter, rangesList.m_switchPoints.end());
00383                      }
00384 
00385                      return;
00386               }
00387        }
00388 }

00391 template <typename ValueType>
00392 void TRanges<ValueType>::Union(const TRanges<ValueType>& rangesList)
00393 {
00394        SwitchPoints::iterator iter = m_switchPoints.begin();
00395        SwitchPoints::const_iterator listIter = rangesList.m_switchPoints.begin();
00396 
00397        bool state = m_beginState;
00398        bool listState = rangesList.m_beginState;
00399 
00400        result.m_beginState = state || listState;
00401 
00402        for (;;){
00403               if (iter != m_switchPoints.end()){
00404                      ValueType point = *iter;
00405 
00406                      if (listIter != rangesList.m_switchPoints.end()){
00407                             ValueType listPoint = *listIter;
00408 
00409                             if (point == listPoint){
00410                                    ++iter;
00411                                    state = !state;
00412                                    ++listIter;
00413                                    listState = !listState;
00414                             }
00415                             else if (point < listPoint){
00416                                    if (listState){
00417                                           iter = m_switchPoints.remove(iter);
00418                                    }
00419                                    else{
00420                                           ++iter;
00421                                    }
00422                                    state = !state;
00423                             }
00424                             else{
00425                                    if (!state){
00426                                           iter = m_switchPoints.insert(iter, listPoint);
00427                                    }
00428                                    ++listIter;
00429                                    listState = !listState;
00430                             }
00431                      }
00432                      else{
00433                             if (listState){
00434                                    m_switchPoints.remove(iter, m_switchPoints.end());
00435                             }
00436 
00437                             return;
00438                      }
00439               }
00440               else{
00441                      if (!state && (listIter != rangesList.m_switchPoints.end())){
00442                             m_switchPoints.insert(listIter, rangesList.m_switchPoints.end());
00443                      }
00444 
00445                      return;
00446               }
00447        }
00448 }

00451 template <typename ValueType>
00452 void TRanges<ValueType>::Union(const TRange<ValueType>& range, bool isInverted)
00453 {
00454        if (range.IsEmpty()){
00455               return;
00456        }
00457 
00458        bool firstPointState = m_beginState;
00459        SwitchPoints::const_iterator firstIter = m_switchPoints.begin();
00460        for (;firstIter != m_switchPoints.end(); ++firstIter){
00461               if (*firstIter > range.GetMinValue()){
00462                      break;
00463               }
00464 
00465               firstPointState = !firstPointState;
00466        }
00467 
00468        bool secondPointState = firstPointState;
00469        SwitchPoints::const_iterator secondIter = firstIter;
00470        for (;secondIter != m_switchPoints.end(); ++secondIter){
00471               if (*secondIter > range.GetMaxValue()){
00472                      break;
00473               }
00474 
00475               secondPointState = !secondPointState;
00476        }
00477 
00478        if (firstIter != secondIter){
00479               // if there are some points in range...
00480               if (isInverted){
00481                      m_switchPoints.erase(m_switchPoints.begin(), firstIter);       // remove all points before
00482                      m_switchPoints.erase(m_switchPoints.begin(), secondIter);      // remove all points after
00483               }
00484               else{
00485                      m_switchPoints.erase(firstIter, secondIter);     // remove all points before
00486               }
00487        }
00488        else{
00489               if (isInverted){
00490                      m_switchPoints.clear();
00491               }
00492        }
00493 
00494        m_beginState = m_beginState || isInverted;
00495 
00496        if (firstPointState != !isInverted){
00497               m_switchPoints.insert(range.GetMinValue());
00498        }
00499 
00500        if (secondPointState != isInverted){
00501               m_switchPoints.insert(range.GetMaxValue());
00502        }
00503 }

00517 template <typename ValueType>
00518 void TRanges<ValueType>::GetIntersection(const TRanges<ValueType>& rangesList, TRanges<ValueType>& result) const
00519 {
00520        SwitchPoints::const_iterator iter = m_switchPoints.begin();
00521        SwitchPoints::const_iterator listIter = rangesList.m_switchPoints.begin();
00522 
00523        bool state = m_beginState;
00524        bool listState = rangesList.m_beginState;
00525 
00526        bool resultState = state && listState;
00527 
00528        result.m_beginState = resultState;
00529        result.m_switchPoints.clear();
00530 
00531        for (;;){
00532               if (iter != m_switchPoints.end()){
00533                      ValueType point = *iter;
00534 
00535                      if (listIter != rangesList.m_switchPoints.end()){
00536                             ValueType listPoint = *listIter;
00537 
00538                             if (point <= listPoint){
00539                                    ++iter;
00540                                    state = !state;
00541                             }
00542 
00543                             if (listPoint <= point){
00544                                    ++listIter;
00545                                    listState = !listState;
00546                             }
00547 
00548                             bool unitedStateAfter = state && listState;
00549                             if (unitedStateAfter != resultState){
00550                                    result.m_switchPoints.insert(qMin(point, listPoint));
00551 
00552                                    resultState = unitedStateAfter;
00553                             }
00554                      }
00555                      else{
00556                             if (listState){
00557                                    result.m_switchPoints.insert(iter, m_switchPoints.end());
00558                             }
00559 
00560                             return;
00561                      }
00562               }
00563               else{
00564                      if (state && (listIter != rangesList.m_switchPoints.end())){
00565                             result.m_switchPoints.insert(listIter, rangesList.m_switchPoints.end());
00566                      }
00567 
00568                      return;
00569               }
00570        }
00571 }

00574 template <typename ValueType>
00575 void TRanges<ValueType>::Intersection(const TRanges<ValueType>& rangesList)
00576 {
00577        SwitchPoints::iterator iter = m_switchPoints.begin();
00578        SwitchPoints::const_iterator listIter = rangesList.m_switchPoints.begin();
00579 
00580        bool state = m_beginState;
00581        bool listState = rangesList.m_beginState;
00582 
00583        m_beginState = state && listState;
00584 
00585        for (;;){
00586               if (iter != m_switchPoints.end()){
00587                      ValueType point = *iter;
00588 
00589                      if (listIter != rangesList.m_switchPoints.end()){
00590                             ValueType listPoint = *listIter;
00591 
00592                             if (point == listPoint){
00593                                    ++iter;
00594                                    state = !state;
00595                                    ++listIter;
00596                                    listState = !listState;
00597                             }
00598                             else if (point < listPoint){
00599                                    if (!listState){
00600                                           iter = m_switchPoints.remove(iter);
00601                                    }
00602                                    else{
00603                                           ++iter;
00604                                    }
00605                                    state = !state;
00606                             }
00607                             else{
00608                                    if (state){
00609                                           iter = m_switchPoints.insert(iter, listPoint);
00610                                    }
00611                                    ++listIter;
00612                                    listState = !listState;
00613                             }
00614                      }
00615                      else{
00616                             if (!listState){
00617                                    m_switchPoints.remove(iter, m_switchPoints.end());
00618                             }
00619 
00620                             return;
00621                      }
00622               }
00623               else{
00624                      if (state && (listIter != rangesList.m_switchPoints.end())){
00625                             m_switchPoints.insert(listIter, rangesList.m_switchPoints.end());
00626                      }
00627 
00628                      return;

00634 template <typename ValueType>
00635 void TRanges<ValueType>::Intersection(const TRange<ValueType>& range, bool isInverted)
00636 {
00637        m_beginState = !m_beginState;
00638 
00639        Union(range, !isInverted);
00640 
00641        m_beginState = !m_beginState;
00642 }

00645 template <typename ValueType>
00646 void TRanges<ValueType>::Erosion(ValueType value)
00647 {
00648        bool isErosion = value > 0;
00649        ValueType correctionValue = qAbs(value);
00650 
00651        bool state = m_beginState;
00652 
00653        SwitchPoints::iterator iter = m_switchPoints.begin();
00654        while (iter != m_switchPoints.end()){
00655               ValueType point = *iter;
00656 
00657               state = !state;
00658 
00659               if (!state == isErosion){
00660                      // move point back
00661                      if (iter != m_switchPoints.begin()){
00662                             SwitchPoints::iterator prevIter = iter;
00663                             --prevIter;
00664 
00665                             if (*prevIter > point - correctionValue * 2){
00666                                    // previous range should be removed - is smaller than the erosion kernel
00667                                    m_switchPoints.erase(prevIter);
00668                                    iter = m_switchPoints.erase(iter);
00669 
00670                                    continue;
00671                             }
00672                      }
00673 
00674                      // range can be moved using kernel size
00675                      iter = m_switchPoints.erase(iter);
00676                      iter = m_switchPoints.insert(iter, point - correctionValue);
00677               }
00678               else{
00679                      // move point forward
00680                      SwitchPoints::iterator nextIter = iter;
00681                      ++nextIter;
00682 
00683                      if (nextIter != m_switchPoints.begin()){
00684                             if (*nextIter < point + correctionValue * 2){
00685                                    // following range should be removed - is smaller than the erosion kernel
00686                                    iter = m_switchPoints.erase(iter);
00687                                    iter = m_switchPoints.erase(iter);
00688 
00689                                    continue;
00690                             }
00691                      }
00692 
00693                      // range can be moved using kernel size
00694                      iter = m_switchPoints.erase(iter);
00695                      iter = m_switchPoints.insert(iter, point + correctionValue);
00696               }
00697 
00698               ++iter;
00699        }
00700 }

00703 template <typename ValueType>
00704 void TRanges<ValueType>::Dilatation(ValueType value)
00705 {
00706        Erosion(-value);
00707 }
00708 
00709 
00710 template <typename ValueType>
00711 void TRanges<ValueType>::RemoveGaps(ValueType value, bool gapState)
00712 {
00713        if (gapState){
00714               Erosion(-value);
00715               Erosion(value);
00716        }
00717        else{
00718               Erosion(value);
00719               Erosion(-value);
00720        }
00721 }
00722 
00723 
00724 template <typename ValueType>
00725 void TRanges<ValueType>::ShiftRanges(ValueType offset)
00726 {
00727        for (         SwitchPoints::iterator iter = m_switchPoints.begin();
00728                             iter != m_switchPoints.end();
00729                             ++iter){
00730               ValueType& position = *iter;
00731 
00732               position += offset;
00733        }
00734 }
00735 
00736 
00737 template <typename ValueType>
00738 void TRanges<ValueType>::GetAsList(const TRange<ValueType>& range, RangeList& result) const
00739 {
00740        int prevPosition = range.GetMinValue();
00741 
00742        bool state = m_beginState;
00743 
00744        for (         SwitchPoints::const_iterator iter = m_switchPoints.begin();
00745                             iter != m_switchPoints.end();
00746                             ++iter){
00747               ValueType position = *iter;
00748               if (position >= range.GetMaxValue()){
00749                      break;
00750               }
00751 
00752               if (position > prevPosition){
00753                      if (!state){
00754                             result.push_back(TRange<ValueType>(prevPosition, position));
00755                      }
00756 
00757                      prevPosition = position;
00758               }
00759 
00760               state = !state;
00761        }
00762 
00763        if (state){
00764               result.push_back(TRange<ValueType>(prevPosition, range.GetMaxValue()));
00765        }
00766 }
